name: AVPlayerItemMetadataCollector
desc: An object used to capture the date range metadata defined for an HTTP Live Streaming asset.

items.name: init(identifiers: [String]?, classifyingLabels: [String]?)
items.desc: Creates a metadata collector to access a stream’s metadata groups matching the specified array of identifiers and classifying labels.

items.name: func setDelegate(AVPlayerItemMetadataCollectorPushDelegate?, queue: DispatchQueue?)
items.desc: Sets the delegate and a dispatch queue on which the delegate will be called.

items.name: var delegate: AVPlayerItemMetadataCollectorPushDelegate?
items.desc: Accesses the metadata collector’s delegate object.

items.name: protocol AVPlayerItemMetadataCollectorPushDelegate
items.desc: A protocol you implement to receive metadata callbacks from a player item metadata collector.

items.name: var delegateQueue: DispatchQueue?
items.desc: The dispatch queue on which the delegate’s methods are called.
